Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory140.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: 'Let me introduce you all to our new recruit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: "Her name is... I'll just let her introduce herself because I don't know her name.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hyena', 3: 'Some call me... "Hyena".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Laughing Crowd', 3: '"Hyena"? What kind of bull name is that?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: 'No one would call a girl "Hyena", unless you can prove yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Boss, our standards are getting lower and lower! You bring back kid this time, are you gonna bring back a cripple next time?'}
{3: 'As if sensing "Hyena" is about to explode in anger, Andre puts a hand on her shoulder to hold her back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: 'He means no ill.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Feeling "Hyena" relaxing under his hand, he lets go of his hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: 'What, Clegg? Do you have opinions on how I pick people?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: 'Did I make the wrong choice when picking you or the others here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: 'O-of course not!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: "Then that's that. You're thinking you can finally get rid of your last place title now that a kid's here, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Well, she's a kid. How can I be worse than a kid..."}
{3: 'Andre smirks before pushing "Hyena" into the crowd of workers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: "From today on, she'll be a part of the investigation team. Clegg, you're in charge of her!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Aww, come on... Why'd it have to be me..."}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: 'Hey! You! Listen up. I may have the worse scores during training, but the investigation team is always the busiest!'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Alright, there's a pipeline failure in section B of the exhaust gas recovery system. Go have a look."}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "If you can fix it, then fix it. If you can't, come back and tell me."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hyena', 3: '...Where are the maintenance tools?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Looks like you know the basics. You've seen us working before? It's on the shelf over there next to the mop bucket."}
{3: '"Hyena" quietly takes the tool kit off the shelf and straps it to her back. She then pushes open the door and leaves.'}
{2: 'Inspection Team Member', 3: "Aren't you being a little too harsh, Clegg?"}
{2: 'Inspection Team Member', 3: 'According to the rules, members have to undergo three months of training before they can attend to exhaust gas maintenance...'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "That's a rule for newbies who know nothing."}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "I don't know why the boss decided to recruit a kid, but I hope he has his reasons."}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "If she's just a normal kid then I don't mind being the villain here."}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Of course, I hope she'd just be a normal kid, scurrying home crying. That tool kit can be sold in exchange for food for a few days. It's not a bad deal for her."}
{2: 'Inspection Team Member', 3: 'But what if the boss asks?'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Whatever. I doubt he'd want to see a newbie gone after a few jobs again."}
{3: 'When Clegg wakes up from his nap and sees a "Hyena" covered in dirt and oil before him, an hour has already passed.'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "What the...?! You almost gave me a heart attack there! How's the exhaust gas recovery system?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hyena', 3: '...I found this stuck in the pipe.', 4: '1'}
{3: '"Hyena" tosses an oily balled-up cloth onto the ground in front of Clegg. The logo of the inspection team could still be seen vaguely.'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "I thought I'd stuck it in deep enough... Never thought you'd find it."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hyena', 3: 'Why did you do it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hyena', 3: '...Do you hate me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "Not really, but if the boss tossed me someone with no credentials, then I'd have to find the evidence myself to prove she's reliable."}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: "I was wrong. If you wanna tell the boss, you're free to do so."}
{3: 'Clegg and "Hyena" stare at each other, hoping to find the answer in the other\'s eyes. They were suddenly interrupted by Andre pushing open the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: 'Clegg! You little s**t, I heard you ordered the new girl to repair the exhaust gas recovery system!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: "I'm only going to ask you this, what's your conclusion? You only keep those who are useful, which is why I entrusted her to you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Clegg raises his hands and diverts his gaze away from "Hyena".'}
{2: 'Clegg', 3: 'She passed. Looks like I get to keep the honor of being in last place.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: 'Good. I was most worried about your attitude when I took her in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: "That's settled then! Kid, here's your uniform! Look at how dirty you are, go take shower! We left the shower empty just for you!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1202.jpg'}
{3: 'It has been 197 days since "Hyena" joined the inspection team. She never cared to keep count of the days, but now, every day is precious to her.'}
{3: 'It was everything she had ever dreamt of—bed fluffier than steel slabs and asbestos, two whole meals a day, at least 6 hours of sleep every night, a hot shower every two days...'}
{3: 'Chief Andre may look like a tough guy, but deep down he was very thoughtful and considerate, he knew how to make tasty scrambled eggs and resizing uniforms for small girls.'}
{3: 'As long as people do not make fun of his treasured badge—which he claims to be an authentic royal token—he does not mind most of the time.'}
{3: 'Leader Clegg, always ranking last, but he can remember where every wrench and every screw is; stubborn and stingy, and also short-sighted.'}

{3: 'Leader Katyusha, the leader of the structure team. One of the only three females in the whole inspection team. She can run faster than anyone in a 10km run with weights. She is also one of the few that were present on "that day."'}
{3: 'As for "Hyena"... Well, she\'s no longer ""Hyena"" now. Lena from the structure team gave her a new name—"Sophia".'}
{3: 'From what she\'s heard, this is the name of Chief Andre\'s homeland. And in the language of the Golden Age, it meant "gift from God".'}
{3: 'Recently, someone found a movie from the Golden Age.'}
{3: 'And after that, Chief Andre insists on others calling him "Boss" like Clegg does.'}
{3: 'It has been 197 days since Sophia joined the inspection team.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory140.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Today... It's been... Since Sophia joined the inspection team... I don't know how to write. I'm going to leave it blank for now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Today, Sophia... Start... Follow Chif, Endre to... Can't spell this. Delete... Work together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "It's... Sophia's, first time... bring tiim to work outside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: "Sophia! It's time!"}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "(...I'll get back to this later.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Coming!', 4: '1'}
